storyInfo: Everyone in the monastery has their own plans. Federico and his party, having just arrived at the monastery gates, are blocked by the residents.

attributes.text: It was autumn at the time, and I was trekking through the barren wastes with a few Iberians who were fleeing their homeland.
Just when we thought we were going to meet our ends there, the abbey appeared in front of us. It seemed like some sort of miracle, an act of divine intervention that couldn't be real.
The venerable abbot, Bishop Torregrossa, took in those people who had nowhere to go. He was a respectable elder, most pious and devout in his ways.
Under his management, this monastery, cut off from the rest of the land by the wilderness, became its own fantastical domain of sorts.

Here, people whose lives would normally never intertwine lived in harmony, depending on one another. They lived in material poverty but not spiritual poverty, making no distinction between class, all putting their best feet forward to live life.

attributes.content: I knew it, this handwriting...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.text: When I made my request, the Abbot replied to me after an extended silence, saying that while he would not refuse aid to those in need, there was not much he could do, because of my distance.

Maybe because I wasn't expecting much in the first place, I didn't feel too bad about being turned down. If anything, he seemed be more guilty and chagrined about turning down my unreasonable request than the person who made it in the first place.
I am deeply gratified that there exists such a paradise for good people, but at the same time, I could not help but raise this one question:
Can this miracle, like a seed that refuses to adapt to the soil it is grown in, truly persist on this land?
Maybe I've been here a bit too long.
It's about time I set out again, to Laterano.

attributes.content: 'People whose lives would normally never intertwine', 'making no distinction between class'...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes, when I first saw the scene, I also doubted my eyes, a bit.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If I was speaking just for myself, I'd really hope this peace, rare as it is, could last forever.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Are you busy, Seniora Lemuen?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Remember that pattern you were talking about earlier? Some of the others tried embroidering it onto a quilt with me. How do you think it turned out?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Let's see... Mm, hmm. Excellent craftsmanship. It wouldn't surprise me to find it on display in a store.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You're exaggerating.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Now that it's getting colder, the blankets you have with you might not be enough to keep you warm, so everyone pitched in some fabric.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: I appreciate the concern.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But if you give it to me, the others might not have enough? You should think about them first.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I know how I look, but I'm actually plenty tough. I don't get sick easily.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Haha, don't worry about us. As long as everyone chips in, it's not a big deal.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: But, I must say, I'm not sure 'tough' is what comes to mind when I look at you. What's Laterano thinking these days, sending you so far away?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Well, um, about that...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's a question I'd like to ask my superiors.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Why don't we go back?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Because Raimund and the others can't go with us! Isn't that reason enough?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: You want to leave them behind? Well, I don't!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: (Stupid Fina, do you really think I'm that cold-blooded? Of course I'm not going to leave behind the people I grew up with.)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (But, we can just stay stuck like this forever either. Tempers have really been high lately...)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (Is there no better solution?)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What's wrong? What are you sighing for this time?
That's odd... Why are you here by yourself? Delfina's not with you?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Raimund!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What's that supposed to mean? It's not like Delfina and I are stuck together!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You might as well be. You're close enough, just one step from sharing a bed.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: We do sleep together sometimes though... Hey wait, that's not the point!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: When'd you get back anyway? I heard you went hunting with Senior Gerald. Any luck? Didn't get hurt, did you?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Make sure you let us know if you ever do get hurt. Don't be like Senior Gerald, who just toughs it out by himself.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'm fine. I don't need you worrying over me for no reason.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: For no reason? Who's the one who said nothing until his wounds got inflamed? And who's the one who went down into the mines without permission and barely made it back?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You–
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I know, I know, let's just say it was my fault, okay?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Huh? 'Let's just say'?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: ...It was my fault.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Fortuna.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Actually, I came back because I wanted to ask you... and Delfina. And of course, the others as well.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I wanted to ask... if you wanted to come with us...?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: The young man stopped speaking halfway through.
He suddenly falls silent.
Raimund?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Never mind, it's no big deal.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I need to leave for a bit, and might not be back until late.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Fortuna, can you come to the roof of the sacrarium before dinner?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Bring Delfina with you too... There's something I need to tell you two.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Let me take a look. What's going on here?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: They even built a road by the monastery? It stretches all the way to the edge of the city... Is it really so cramped inside? I personally think it's plenty spacious.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Are there so many people here? It must be tough feeding a crowd that big... especially out in the barrens.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: See for yourself.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Someone's coming.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hmm? Oh, someone just walked out. Should be one of the residents?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Where'd Hyman run off to...?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Oh? Salvus sis, hottie with a hidden face.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ––! Who's there?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Halos... You're Sankta.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I don't care who you people are, or what you're after, but you're not coming any closer!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Let's not jump right to drawing swords and crossbows. We only just met. Why don't we all take a deep breath and talk things through?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Senior. The three of us here are from Laterano, without any ill intent. No need to be so tense... I'd be pleased as punch if you'd lower your weapon.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What brings some Laterans all the way out to these remote mountains?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Um, we were sent by His Holiness in search of two compatriots.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You're wasting your time, Richele.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It is clear to me that he knows exactly who we are and why we have come. He has hostile intent.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You clearly have strong animosity towards Laterano, judging from the displeasure on your face. From where does your hostility come?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...I have no idea what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You've been standing by the entrance to the side alley this whole time.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're deliberately trying to block our view. You don't want our attention there.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So, what is in there?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who do you think you are–
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Alright, Federico, there's no need to provoke the other side! Though, I'm sure that wasn't your intention.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You haven't forgotten the mission His Holiness gave us, right? Low key, low key. We can't afford to make a mess of things again.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I wasn't trying to provoke anyone.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hah, you Laterans are always like this. Showing up out of nowhere, making a mess out of everything.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Given the information we have, your situation wasn't looking good to begin with.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...I dare you to say that again.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Wanna fight? C'mon, I'll show you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: The air is awfully tense over there...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Federico has a way of drawing attention. And that makes light work of burglary.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But, that hooded guy over there... Ugh, something's not right here.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Forget it, I'll figure out the math later.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: First, I need to find our target.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Haha, let me guess where you might be, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Looks like no shortage of guests today.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Hello, Senior Gerald.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I thought I'd get to see Stefano here.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: His Excellency still has a lot of business to attend to. He just left.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: He can't have gotten very far, so given your athleticism, I'm sure you could catch up to him.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I haven't heard you hitting the strings today.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: If you enjoy the sound of my music, I don't mind playing something for you right now.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm very grateful... for the joy you've been able to bring some of our people.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But not everyone finds comfort in your music. At least, I don't.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I can't imagine why a musician like you chooses to remain here... But I do hope you won't bring disaster upon us.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You think too highly of me.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: As far as I know, disasters have always been buried in the soil, from whence they take root, sprout, blossom, and bear fruit.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: If such a seed exists in this garden, it will break through the soil sooner or later.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And I... am simply a passerby, watching it all unfold.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: We have no seeds that ought not sprout.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Before long, everything will return to normal. There will be no accidents, let alone disasters.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: All I ask, young lady, is that you don't do anything unnecessary.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Are you giving advice?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm giving you a warning.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Such roundabout, insensitive words. Though, I suppose the fact that you haven't done anything means you're holding back, right?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I suppose that's to be expected, given the circumstances.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh my.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Pretty...
attributes.name: Raggedly-Dressed Boy

attributes.content: Ma'am...
attributes.name: Raggedly-Dressed Girl

attributes.content: Indeed, no shortage of guests today.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Please come in, my unexpected little visitors.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: My name is Arturia. Would you mind telling me yours?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Okay, okay. Stop talking like that, Federico.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I didn't say anything wrong.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Just stay quiet for now, alright?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And you, young man, let's not do anything rash. We really are just looking for one of our missing colleagues, and uh, whoever you might be, we mean you no harm.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmph. You sure can talk.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That bruiser of yours means me no harm?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Ahem, well, you have my word. Either way... could you please let us through? If you could tell the man in charge we're here, that would be ideal.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Serpilia... Huh? Where did Serpilia go?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: She's already inside.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Huh? When she–?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Just now.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Gah! I can't let you Laterans run roughshod!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Aren't you here to see the abbot? Come with me!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Haha... Great, does that mean you're letting us in?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: A warning, first: no running off like that woman–
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Oh no! Hurry, s-someone!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Clément? What's wrong? What happened?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Thank goodness, Raimund! Let the others know–
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: A raid?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right! Err, Raimund, who are these two?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Don't worry about them! What's going on?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Oh, r-right... It's terrible!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I was repairing the windows just now, when I saw something moving in the distance–
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The band of robbers from before! They're back!
attributes.name: Clément
